 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲטָפָה‎</span>] **noun feminine** ==overtunic== (so Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — plural absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲטָפוֺת‎</span> [[Isa.3.22|Isa 3:22]].
